name: Ghostemane Pentacles 1.5
description:
Ghostemane Pentacles 1.5 is a unique marathon style retro game. @Ghostemane & @Rapsmyinitials bring you a simple & addictive endless challenge. Tap once anywhere on the screen or double tap again anywhere on the screen to land on platforms without falling below!
Look out for the Demon's fireball & watch out for the running devil. Farther distance you go & Pentacles collected increases your score. Try tapping the other characters for bonus points (devil, & floating imp) All Un-lockable characters & all music is available to use right away & special Ghostemane bonus spiritual board! Compete worldwide with the Game Center leaderboard & collect all the achievements
